Rosmodules¶

The rosmodules directory contains the different ROS modules. Each module is again located in a separate directory. Each ROS modules has a specific layout and meta dat in order to be recognized as a ROS module. The code for the ROS modules is located in the scripts directory within a ROS module.

Module: bridge¶

The bridge module contains one application: relay.py. It handles the conversion of ROS messages to STOMP messages and vice versa.

Module: nao¶

The nao module is responsible for the control of the NAO robot. This is an off-the-shelf robot: http://www.aldebaran-robotics.com/en/
